title: Spacious 1-Bedroom at eaves by AvalonBay
posting_body: Welcome to eaves Daly City, located in San Mateo County — where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living.
We provide high-quality Daly City apartments with a few little add-ons, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and mirrored closet doors.
Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living.
Simply put, our apartments in Daly City offer more of what you hope for.
Better than you bargained for.
So, what are you waiting for?
Daly City Apartment Community Now that you’ve decided to make Daly City your home, you deserve an apartment where you can live comfortably.
Daly City is central to two of the Bay Area's major job growth zones in the San Francisco and San Mateo counties.
Located on King Drive, our beautiful eaves apartment community offers residents convenient access to popular restaurants like Joe of Westlake and Estrada's Spanish Kitchen.
There are also a wealth of local attractions nearby like Cow Palace and Thornton Beach.
Residents will also enjoy the benefits of a central location, diversified economy, excellent transportation links and the growing labor force.
About Daly City, CA Members of the Daly City apartment community are guaranteed to enjoy a life of comfort and convenience.
We also offer a range of community amenities including an outdoor swimming pool, hot tub and fitness center, ensuring that you'll always have everything you need in your day to day life.
We’ll take care of any issues that arise, quickly and smoothly, allowing you to focus on the important parts of your life.
Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in Daly City today.
-Parking
